<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE Mumbai Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference! Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: October 15th, 2018
Location: Hotel ITC Maratha, Sahar Road, Opposite Chhatrapati Shivaji Airport, Andheri East, Mumbai 400 099 (Maharashtra)
Agenda:
12:00 - 12:15
Welcome
12:15 – 12:45
Sponsor introduction
12:45 - 13:45
Lunch
13:45 - 14:15
Customer and support organization presentation, Global Customer Committee overview and update
14:15 - 14:30
The Connected Aircraft - Inmarsat Technology: SwiftBroadband & JetConnex
14:30 - 14:45
The Connected Aircraft - Honeywell Technology: JetWave, Multi-Channel Satellite series & Routers
14:45 – 15:15
Honeywell GoDirect™ – bringing the highest quality of connectivity to you
15:15 - 15:45
Break + 1st session focused (table) discussions
15:45 – 16:15
Protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)
16:15 - 16:45
Honeywell Technology: Mandate Coverage & Upgrades
16:45 - 17:00
Aerotech Support update
17:00 - 17:15
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT)
17:15 – 17:30
Q & A
17:30 – 18:00
2nd session focused (table) discussions
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HonOpsConf_India_2018.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you in Mumbai!
Jiri Huml Customer Support Manager
